namedStrings.MOTD: Hello and Welcome to the NosferatuNetwork Chatserver.
generalHelp: messages prefixed with # are passed to the diceroller
it expects a number following # and then options
followed by numbers again. Options are
dXX : sets sidedness of dice to XX. (standard: 10)
eXX : sets difficulty to XX and discards 1s
fXX : sets difficulty to XX and subtracts 1s (standard: 6)
!   : sets explosions, use multiple for cumulative effect
Example: #5d4f2 !! will roll 5 4 sided die, rerolled on
a 3 or 4 and counting 2 and up, subtracting ones.
Example: #3 will roll 3 10 sided dice, counting 6 and up, subtracting ones
#XX : load define named XX
=XX : command for defines:
=clear  : clears all definitions
=import : imports/reloads the values from the sheet
=setup  : a usefull basic set of definitions
=show   : shows all currently defined Definitions
A=B : defines A to resolve to B. B resolves recursively
If B is two values they will be added.
If there is a _ after something (on the lowest level)
it will resolve to -1 instead of 0 (useful for abilities)
Example: Try: #=setup<enter> #dmg=str 2<enter> #dmg<enter>
and see what happens!
Remember: you can always add ? to a command to inspect what
it's doing instead of actually sending it.
chatHelp: width  <n>: adjusts page width (35 is standart)
height <n>: adjusts height of this box (in pixel)
switch <s>: makes the specified room active
menu      : to switch to menu mode
msg    <s>: sends private message to user
mailbox   : to check the log of messages send to you
log       : to get the log of the room you are in
checkHelp: Click "Check" down below to check if this sheet
is a valid starting character (If your history is empty),
or calculate the difference in XP to the last sheet in
talkMode: entering talk mode, prefix further commands with "/"
Everything else will be sent to the active chat!
namedStrings.cmdNotFound: Unfortunately, this command has not been found.
namedStrings.roomlistErr: There was en error with the roomlist in the session...
namedStrings.noLogRoom: No room to get log from!
namedStrings.noListRoom: No room to get list from!
